Plot.
Paul Hacketts embarks on a trip to SoHo in hopes of scoring with a pretty
women he just met, but when his money flies out the window he is stuck in
SoHo. The movie details his experiences that night with a wide array of
criminals, kooks, psychotics, sadomasochists, punks, and an angry mob trying
to kill him. Strangely, the seemingly disconnected events are interwoven in
unusual and unexpected ways.
